data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yu, Sergey, Paik, Jong-Cheol (2011): Review of the genus Haplotropis Saussure, 1888 (Orthoptera: Pamphagidae), with notes on classification of the subfamilies Pamphaginae and Trinchinae. Zootaxa 2897: 27-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206522
